title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica Movie 3: Hangyaku no Monogatari - Magica Quartet x Nisioisin
synopsis:
Before the feature presentation of Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica Movie 3: Hangyaku no Monogatari, the characters of Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica and the Monogatari series team up to provide moviegoers with friendly reminders to ensure the best viewing experience—albeit they each do so in their own peculiar way.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
